item.title: Dominique add a quote by Jennifer Roberson
item.description: "It's difficult admitting you're wrong. Even more difficult admitting it when you have scoffed and otherwise ridiculed the truth with blind, unremitting determination, so blithely confident in your own infallibility. But then one day -- or one night -- the truth is put into your hands, and you realize those stories and songs and legends told by Northern strangers are truths after all, and that no one has lied to you." -- Jennifer Roberson

item.title: Dominique add a quote by Jennifer Roberson
item.description: "And we are made different. On the instant. What we know, what we were, is banished by that instant, razed like a castle under siege, and nothing is recognizable is left. The world is unmade." -- Jennifer Roberson
